General.Name: Beijing TRS Information Tech
General.Description: TRS Information Technology Co., Ltd. provides software, artificial intelligence, big data, and data security products and services in China. It also offers technology promotion, development, transfer, and consulting services; technology testing services; computer system services; data processing services; and computer maintenance, and computer technology training services. In addition, the company engages in the sale of computers, software and auxiliary equipment, electronic products, and communication equipment; investment management; research and development, and sale of knowledge graph technology and big data analysis software; provision of big data intelligent service products with financial technology; and marketing development. Further, it provides data security transmission and exchange products and services. TRS Information Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
